title: Nightflyers Episode 2 "Torches and Pitchforks" Breakdown!
author: Think Story
comment: This show is really turning out to be interesting.
I just knew you would cover this show!  I totally didn’t catch that nobody acknowledged Tessia! So glad you are watching it
Crazy bee lady? Captain Eris talking about a "force"? Lazer spiders? This show has it all!

Thank you for another breakdown.  I'm thinking robo spiders from Stargate: SG1 and domes from the movie "Silent Running".....lol.....  waiting for other "things" to pop up.  IMHO..not really getting interesting yet....lemme go watch Ep 3 now.
description:
I break down episode 2 of George R.R. Martin's Netflix adaptation of "Nightflyers", "Torches and Pitchforks" as well as look at different theories and details you missed!

Follow me on twitter:
